document.full_text: though often called the 'godfather of rap,' mr. scott-heron preferred to call himself a 'bluesologist,' drawing on blues, jazz and harlem renaissance poetics.
document.title: gil scott-heron, voice of black culture, dies at 62
lines_and_colors: though often called the 'godfather of rap,' mr. scott-heron preferred to call himself a 'bluesologist,' drawing on blues, jazz and harlem renaissance poetics.
